description: You rarely root for a cybercriminal, but a new malware campaign targeting child exploiters doesn't make you feel bad for the victims. [...]
title: Malware dev lures child exploiters into honeytrap to extort them

description: Ransomware actors have had a rough start this year, as stats from cybersecurity firm Coveware show that the trend of victims declining to pay the cybercriminals continues and has now reached a new record low of 28%. [...]
title: Ransomware payments drop to record low of 28% in Q1 2024
